Name: Thai Lady
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE lemongrass in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A White Lady with the added flavour of lemongrass.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Jamie Terrell, London, England.
